scripts.prebuild: node -e "if (!require('fs').existsSync('src/data/resume.json')) { const d = process.env.RESUME_DATA; if (d) require('fs').writeFileSync('src/data/resume.json', d); else { console.error('ERROR: src/data/resume.json not found. Copy resume.example.json or set RESUME_DATA env var.'); process.exit(1); } }"
